comment:
* Utility class to use new APIs that were added in N (API level 24). These need to exist in a
 * separate class so that Android framework can successfully verify classes without
 * encountering the new APIs.

methods.name: public static boolean startDragAndDrop(View view, ClipData data, DragShadowBuilder shadowBuilder, Object myLocalState, int flags)
public static void setCryptoInfoPattern(CryptoInfo cryptoInfo, int encrypt, int skip)
public static void setVrModeEnabled(Activity activity, boolean enabled, ComponentName requestedComponent) throws PackageManager.NameNotFoundException
public static PointerIcon onResolvePointerIcon(View view, MotionEvent event, int pointerIndex)

methodNames: public static boolean startDragAndDrop(View view, ClipData data, DragShadowBuilder shadowBuilder, Object myLocalState, int flags)
public static void setCryptoInfoPattern(CryptoInfo cryptoInfo, int encrypt, int skip)
public static void setVrModeEnabled(Activity activity, boolean enabled, ComponentName requestedComponent) throws PackageManager.NameNotFoundException
public static PointerIcon onResolvePointerIcon(View view, MotionEvent event, int pointerIndex)
